name: HDFC Bank Alerts
subject: IMPORTANT: KYC Update Required Immediately
body: Dear Customer, Your KYC details are pending update. As per RBI guidelines, your account will be frozen if not updated within 24 hours. Please visit your nearest branch or log in to netbanking to submit the required documents. Regards, HDFC Bank.

action_item.task: Submit KYC details or visit nearest branch to update account

reply:
Dear HDFC Bank Alerts,

I think there's been a misunderstanding - I'm not a customer of HDFC Bank, nor do I have an account with your institution. I'd appreciate it if you could refrain from sending me future emails regarding my non-existent account. Perhaps you could update your email list with more accurate contact information?

Best regards,

name: OceanAI (MariApps Marine Solutions)
subject: Selection Update - Next Round
body:
Dear Anush Jain,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the next round of our selection process at OceanAI (MariApps Marine Solutions Private Limited).

Your performance in the previous round was impressive. We will be sharing the details regarding the schedule and format of the next round shortly.

Congratulations and best of luck!

Warm regards,
HR Team
OceanAI

action_item.task: None

reply:
Dear Anush Jain,

We are delighted to hear that you have been shortlisted for the next round of our selection process. Your performance in the previous round was indeed impressive, and we are eager to see your progress in the next stage.

To confirm, we will be sharing the details regarding the schedule and format of the next round with you shortly. If there's any specific information you need in the meantime or would like to clarify, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Once again, congratulations and best of luck in the next round. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
The HR Team

name: Priya Sharma (HR)
subject: Diwali Celebration & Rangoli Competition
body: Hi Team, We are hosting a Rangoli competition tomorrow at 4 PM in the cafeteria. Traditional wear is encouraged. Snacks (Samosas and Jalebis) will be served. Attendance is mandatory for the town hall at 5 PM. Let's make this festive!

action_item.task: Host Rangoli competition in the cafeteria

reply:
Hi Priya, 

Thank you for organizing the Diwali celebration and Rangoli competition. I'm looking forward to participating in the event and representing our team's creativity. I'll make sure to attend the town hall meeting at 5 PM as required. Please let me know if there's an agenda for the meeting so I can come prepared.

Best regards, 
[Your Name]

name: Zomato
subject: You + Biryani = ❤️
body: Hey Anush, We saw you looking at that Biryani yesterday. Why play hard to get? Order now and get 40% off. Your stomach called, it wants a treat.

action_item.task: None

reply:
Dear Zomato Team,

Thanks for the offer, but I think my stomach is doing just fine without a prompt to order Biryani. I appreciate the discount, but I'll pass on this one. Please remove me from your newsletter list if you could.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

name: Dr. Mbogo
subject: URGENT: INHERITANCE CLAIM $5,000,000
body: Dearest Beloved, I am the executor of a large estate. You have been named beneficiary. Kindly click this link http://bit.ly/claim-money-now to provide your bank details and pay a small processing fee. God Bless.

action_item.task: Click the link to provide bank details and pay a small processing fee

reply:
Dear Dr. Mbogo,

I'm not sure which dictionary you're using, but I think you may be confusing me with someone who uses the internet to find lost treasure. I'm afraid clicking on suspicious links and providing bank details isn't exactly how inheritance claims work.

As a friendly reminder, if I actually had an inheritance claim, I'd be getting a phone call from a lawyer, not an email from a mysterious executor with a broken link.

Thanks for the laugh, though.

Best regards,

name: Amit Verma
subject: Urgent: Production Issue - Login Failed
body: Hi Anush, We are seeing a spike in 500 errors on the login page. Clients are escalating. Please look into the logs immediately and update the status on the bridge call.

action_item.task: Look into the logs of the login page

reply:
Dear Amit,

Thank you for bringing this urgent matter to my attention. I understand the severity of the issue and will immediately investigate the logs to identify the cause of the 500 errors on the login page. I will also update the status on the bridge call.

Regarding the next steps, I will work closely with the development team to resolve the issue as soon as possible. I will keep you informed of my progress and will provide a detailed update on the root cause and the plan to prevent similar issues in the future.

Please let me know if you need any further information from me in the meantime. I will prioritize this task and ensure that it is resolved at the earliest.

Best regards,
Anush

name: Finshots
subject: Why is gold shining again?
body: In today's story, we discuss why central banks are hoarding gold and what it means for your portfolio. Plus, a quick look at the EV market slump.

action_item.task: None

name: Raju (Intern)
subject: Mistake in DB...
body: Sir, I think I accidentally deleted the 'test_users' table, but now the main app is not working. Is 'prod_users' linked to it? Please help, I am scared.

action_item.task: Restore or recreate the 'test_users' table

name: Apple Support
subject: Your Apple ID has been locked
body: We detected unusual activity on your account. Your ID will be deleted in 12 hours. Verify your identity here: http://apple-verify-secure.com/login. Do not ignore.

action_item.task: Verify your identity on the given link

reply:
Dear Apple Support,

I think there may be some confusion. Apple's official support email address is support@apple.com, not @apple-id-lock.com. I'm not sure what's going on here, but I'm pretty certain my ID isn't going anywhere. If you'll excuse me, I have to go verify my identity... with myself. Please, for the love of all things digital, be real.

Best regards,

name: Swiggy
subject: It's raining! Chai pakoda time?
body: The weather demands it. Hot tea and crispy pakoras delivered in 20 mins. Don't fight the feeling.

action_item.task: Order hot tea and crispy pakoras for delivery

name: Income Tax Dept
subject: Intimation u/s 143(1) for AY 2024-25
body: Your return for AY 2024-25 has been processed. There is no demand or refund due. Please check the attached intimation order for details.

action_item.task: Check the attached intimation order for details

reply:
Dear Income Tax Department,

Thank you for the prompt update on the status of my AY 2024-25 return. I appreciate your efforts in processing my return, and I'm relieved to hear that there is no demand or refund due.

I will review the attached intimation order as soon as possible. If I have any questions or concerns, I will be in touch with your department.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best regards,

name: Ankit (Dev)
subject: PR Review - Backend API
body: Hey, I've pushed the changes for the new API endpoint. Can you review it? I've added comments this time, promise.

action_item.task: Review new API endpoint

name: Lenskart
subject: Vincent Chase: Buy 1 Get 1 Free
body: Your eyes deserve the best. Grab the trendiest frames now. Gold membership available at Rs. 500.

action_item.task: Grab the trendiest frames now

name: Rohan Das (CEO)
subject: Urgent Task
body: I am in a meeting and cannot talk. I need you to purchase 5 Google Play gift cards for a client immediately. Send me the codes here. I will reimburse you.

action_item.task: Purchase 5 Google Play gift cards for a client

name: Mr. Smith
subject: Q3 Project Roadmap Discussion
body: Dear Team, Please find attached the agenda for the Q3 roadmap discussion. We need to finalize the deliverables by Friday. Please come prepared with your estimates.

action_item.task: Finalize Q3 roadmap deliverables

name: AWS Billing
subject: AWS Invoice Available
body: Your invoice for the billing period November 2025 is ready. Total amount: $12.45. The payment will be charged to your credit card on file.

action_item.task: Review and verify the invoice

name: Sneha (Design)
subject: New UI Assets
body: Hi, I've uploaded the new icons to Zeplin. I went with a 'minimalist yet bold' vibe. Let me know if the developers scream at the export settings.

action_item.task: Review export settings for the new icons uploaded to Zeplin

name: Bajaj Finserv
subject: Pre-approved Personal Loan Offer
body: Dear Customer, You are eligible for a pre-approved personal loan of Rs. 3 Lakhs with minimal documentation. Click here to apply instantly.

action_item.task: Apply for the pre-approved personal loan

name: RWA Secretary
subject: Water Supply Disruption
body: Dear Residents, Water supply will be disrupted tomorrow from 10 AM to 2 PM due to tank cleaning. Please store water accordingly. Inconvenience is regretted.

action_item.task: Store water accordingly

reply:
Dear Residents,

Thank you for the advance notice regarding the water supply disruption. I appreciate your efforts in informing us of the scheduled tank cleaning. Please be assured that we will make necessary arrangements to store sufficient water for our needs during the disruption.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to the administration. We will do our best to minimize the inconvenience caused.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

name: LinkedIn Jobs
subject: 30 new jobs match your profile
body: Senior Python Developer at Google, Data Scientist at Microsoft, and more. Apply early to be one of the first applicants.

action_item.task: Apply for the Senior Python Developer position at Google

reply: I've received your email listing various job opportunities, including the Senior Python Developer position at Google and the Data Scientist position at Microsoft. However, I'm afraid you've reached the right person, but the wrong inbox. As a senior developer, I don't think I need to be reminded about applying early for these roles - my skills are already sought after by the top tech giants. Thanks for the laugh, though!

name: Mom
subject: Pick up cousin
body: Rohan is coming to the city today. His train reaches at 6 PM. Go pick him up. Don't be late.

action_item.task: Pick up Rohan from the train station

reply:
Dear Mom, 

I've got the train schedule marked, and I'll make sure to pick Rohan up from the station on time. I'll see you both soon. Take care.

Best, [Your Name]
